title: Earth Science-Language Integrated Instructional Design Workshop Using the 5E Teaching Model: Strengthening Scientific Text-Based Inquiry Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic earth science concepts, foundational language education knowledge (grammar, vocabulary, text analysis), experience in inquiry-based lesson design, and understanding of scientific argumentation structures
context.additional_context: Enhance instructional design competencies for integrating earth science content into language education for current practitioners—focus on scientific argumentative text analysis, multiliteracy development, and academic expression skills. Particularly cultivate evidence-based conclusion drawing and text reorganization abilities.

learning_goals: Enhancing Earth science lesson design skills according to the 5E Instructional Model (achieved at ≥80% proficiency) – integrating scientific inquiry question formulation, experimental evidence analysis, and scientific conclusion-drawing activities.

Securing instructional material development and critical application skills using generative AI (ChatGPT) – strengthening scientific text generation, revision, evaluation competencies, and academic expression abilities.

Designing Earth Science-Language Integrated Activities Aligned with Learner Levels and Curriculum Standards - Development of Integrated Reading, Writing, and Speaking Tasks and Enhancement of Multiliteracy Activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
